Header: TNA MP calls on the Government to increase military security in the North and East
Content: Ilangai Thamil Arusu Party Leader Parliamentarian Marvai Senathiraja has called to increase military security in the North and the East. He made this request joining in a May Day rally held by his party in Kilinochchi. Marvai Senathiraja said that wherever they go the people say query that they want security to schools, offices and their assets. As such he said they are calling on the Government to provide them security. It was they who said to reduce the presence of forces in their areas. But now they say that they need the security of the Army. He added that the time has come for them to be cautious.
